ing: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of shrimp soup
des: "A rich, creamy fondue, great for dunking chunks of fresh French bread-- or topping a bbq'd steak...a family favorite for sure!"
ins: Melt sour cream, cream cheese, shrimp soup, Worcestershire sauce and garlic salt over a low heat in a medium size pot. Cook until melted together and the mixture has a creamy texture. Pour mixture into a serving bowl. Serve hot.
